/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
